tutorial.speak:
To configure navigation links and tabs for your live stream, start from the Dashboard and click on "Sermons" in the left navigation menu.
From the Sermons page, click on the "Live Stream Times" tab to access stream configuration.
On the Live Stream Times page, click the "Settings" button to configure your streaming page options.
In the Settings page, click the add button to add tabs to your livestream
You can add a tab using any external URL or add one of the pre-designed tabs, chat or prayer. If you add a pre-designed tab just give it a name in the tab Text box and the setup is complete.
To add a linked tab, give the tab a name and click the icon button to change the icon for the tab.
Choose from any of the icons listed or search for more icons.
Now enter the URL for the tab you just created. In this case, it is the church calendar for First Ironwood Church.
Your streaming settings now show all configured navigation links. These will appear on your live streaming page for viewers to access additional resources and interactive features. The chat and prayer tabs will appear at the time of the livestream.
